tool_description: Creates comprehensive customer profiles including demographic information, account details, and basic transaction statistics.

profile_depth.description: Level of profile detail: basic, standard, or comprehensive

include_demographics.description: Whether to include demographic information in the profile

error_messages: Customer not found: The specified customer_id does not exist in the dataset
Invalid profile depth: Must be one of [basic, standard, comprehensive]
Insufficient data: Customer has too few transactions to build a reliable profile
usage: Provide customer_id and optionally set profile_depth and include_demographics flag to control the detail level of the generated profile.

account_age_days.description: Number of days since account creation

total_transactions.description: Total number of transactions by this customer

average_transaction_amount.description: Average transaction amount for this customer

risk_category.description: Initial risk categorization based on basic metrics
